channel.title: arduino on benjiaomodular
channel.description: Recent content in arduino on benjiaomodular

item.title: Arduino-based LFO
item.description: A low-frequency oscillator based on HAGIWO’s Ardiuno code and schematics.

item.title: Arduino-based FM VCO
item.description: A freqency-modulation VCO based on HAGIWO’s design

item.title: Random Triggers and CV
item.description: An Arduino-based synth module that produces both randomized CV and randomized gates.

item.title: Arduino-based Master Clock
item.description: A clock module based on an Arduino-nano, has multiple divisions and variable pulse widths.
